org.eclipse.scada.configuration.world.osgi

Interface ValueMapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ItemFeatureEntry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ValueMapperImpl

    public interface ValueMapper
extends ItemFeatureEntry
    A representation of the model object 'Value Mapper'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Source Attribute
    • Target Attribute
    • Data Mapper

    See Also:
    OsgiPackage.getValueMapper()
